title: The Affectionate Film Emperor Only Loves Me - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Arranged Marriage   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cooking   Cute Protagonist   Family Conflict   Forced Marriage   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Marriage   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Showbiz   System Administrator   Terminal Illness   Transmigration
author: Mystery Vase   神秘花瓶
description:
Lin Jianghe was a college student who suddenly kicked the bucket halfway through his game in the middle of the night. Even before he could mourn his own death, he found himself living the life of a small artist inside the world of a book. 

Transmigration? Well, life be like that.

But why did he have to suffer from terminal cancer, facing a life and death crisis with just a few more months left to live, right after he crossed over?

Nevermind, at least he had the food system that allowed him to exchange for his life value by making others experience the pleasure of indulging in delicacies…….

And that was how Lin Jianghe embarked on a path of no return to persuade people to grow fat. Sigh, life really had become more and more colorful….>
